hero.structure: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-12 items-center min-h-[90vh]
hero.image_style: rounded-[3rem] overflow-hidden shadow-2xl rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-all duration-700 ease-out

booking_flow.container: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md rounded-3xl shadow-xl border border-white/50 p-8 md:p-12

dashboard.card_style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-border/60 p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-all

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border-2 border-border hover:border-primary/50 hover:bg-secondary/50 h-12 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-secondary/50 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground h-10 px-4 rounded-lg

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary/10 rounded-xl transition-all
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-foreground/80 mb-2 block

cards.service: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white border border-border/50 p-8 hover:border-primary/30 transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-2xl

hero_main.alt: Bright modern living room with white furniture

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the specific colors defined in this JSON. Do not use default Tailwind colors.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' and configure the font families in Tailwind.
4. LAYOUT: For the Landing Page, strictly follow the 'Bento Mode A' grid for the services section. Do not make a simple row of 3 cards.
5. BOOKING: The booking form must be a multi-step wizard (Service -> Date/Time -> Details -> Confirm). Do not put everything on one long page.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text on the Sage Green primary color is White. Ensure text on the Sand secondary color is Charcoal.
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and service cards.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ğŸ¤–ğŸ§ ğŸ’­ğŸ’¡ğŸ”®ğŸ¯ğŸ“šğŸ­ğŸ¬ğŸªğŸ‰ğŸŠğŸğŸ€ğŸ‚ğŸ°ğŸˆğŸ¨ğŸ°ğŸ’°ğŸ’µğŸ’³ğŸ¦ğŸ’ğŸª™ğŸ’¸ğŸ¤‘ğŸ“ŠğŸ“ˆğŸ“‰ğŸ’¹ğŸ”¢ğŸ†ğŸ¥‡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use 'sonner' for toasts. Sonner component are located in '/app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx'
